creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: ewer; long cylindrical neck shows sprays of flowers; band of flowers forms border of neck and repeat motif (white circles within blue hexagons) reappears on slightly projecting lip; curved blue handle in shape of dragon, head turned backward, jaws wide open; (upper part of jaw broken)
title: Ewer
